title: Brussels plans to scrap 2035 combustion engine ban
description: Carmakers will be allowed to make a limited number of petrol and diesel-fuelled cars after deadline
content: Carmakers will be allowed to make a limited number of petrol and diesel-fuelled cars after deadline
